name: Nidoqueen
flavorText:
Its hard scales
provide strong
protection. It uses its hefty
bulk to execute
powerful moves.

previous.name: Nidorina
previous.flavorText:
The female's horn
develops slowly.
Prefers physical attacks such as
clawing and
biting.

next.name: Nidoran♂
next.flavorText:
Stiffens its ears
to sense danger.
The larger its horns, the more
powerful its
secreted venom.

pokemon.name: Nidoran♀
pokemon.flavorText:
Although small,
its venomous
barbs render this POKéMON dangerous.
The female has
smaller horns.
